plans.fiveYearDescription: A comprehensive five-year plan to improve the Israeli education system, including investment in educational technology, teacher training, and infrastructure improvements. The goal is to bring Israel to first place in the world in educational achievements.
plans.vision2048Description: A long-term vision for creating a personalized education system for every student, integrating artificial intelligence and advanced technologies. By 2048, every student will receive an education tailored to their unique abilities.
